Function Documentation

void eval ( bool  p[],
unsigned int  plist[] 
)

Computes the 4 primes, w, x, y and z, for which w + x + y + z = i.

Parameters:
p An array holding the true/false values of its indices' primality.
plist A list of prime numbers.

Tests the primality of n.

Parameters:

Returns:
True if prime, false otherwise.
